mapper.select: SELECT iqt_cd, iqt_nm, iqt_expln, stc_cd, iqt_reg_adm_cd, iqt_reg_ymdt, iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd, iqt_mdfcn_ymdt FROM inquiry_type ORDER BY iqt_cd ASC;

SELECT i.iq_cd as iq_cd, i.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, it.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, i.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, m.mbr_nm as mbr_nm, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, sa.sa_orgnl_nm as sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm as sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path as sa_path, it.iqt_expln as iqt_expln, it.iqt_reg_ymdt as iqt_reg_ymdt FROM inquiry i JOIN inquiry_type it ON i.iqt_cd = it.iqt_cd LEFT JOIN member m ON i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd LEFT JOIN submission_attachment sa ON i.sa_cd = sa.sa_cd WHERE i.iqt_cd = #{inquiryTypeCode} ORDER BY i.iq_reg_ymdt DESC;

select i.iq_cd as iq_cd, m.mbr_nm as mbr_nm, iqt.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, sa.sa_orgnl_nm as sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm as sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path as sa_path, ip.iqp_ans_cn as iqp_ans_cn, ip.iqp_reg_ymdt as iqp_reg_ymdt, a.adm_cd as adm_cd, m2.mbr_nm as adm_nm from inquiry i left join submission_attachment sa using (sa_cd) inner join member m on i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd inner join inquiry_type iqt using (iqt_cd) left join inquiry_process ip using (iq_cd) left join admin a using (adm_cd) left join member m2 on a.mbr_cd = m2.mbr_cd where i.iq_cd = #{inquiryCode} order by m.mbr_nm desc;

SELECT i.iq_cd as iq_cd, i.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, it.iqt_nm as inquiryTypeName, i.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, m.mbr_nm as memberName, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, sa.sa_orgnl_nm as subAttOrgnlName, sa.sa_srvr_nm as subAttSrvrName, sa.sa_path as subAttPath, it.iqt_expln as inquiryTypeExpln, it.iqt_reg_ymdt as inquiryTypeRegDate FROM inquiry i JOIN inquiry_type it ON i.iqt_cd = it.iqt_cd LEFT JOIN member m ON i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd LEFT JOIN admin a ON i.iq_mdfcn_adm_cd = a.adm_cd LEFT JOIN submission_attachment sa ON i.sa_cd = sa.sa_cd ORDER BY i.iq_reg_ymdt DESC;
